Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle with Wrath.

"Who are we hunting?" Dee=
mos asked...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
  Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


  *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: S=
aturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "Yes, =
let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
  From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday=
, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Wrath: We=
 could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos*
        ----- Original Message -----=
 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Satu=
rday, July 22, 2000 4:39 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "=
It's up to you where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
          ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
          Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrath: Where sh=
ould start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
            ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
            Subject: Re: Ne=
o Beast Wars


            "Hunting? We hunted down almost everyone already=
, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

            "Good to practice with o=
ur new beast modes." Deemos said. He patted Wrath on the shoulder.

       =
     "Those Alliance and Preds will be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" De=
emos said. Inzola looked at Wrath.

            "The Maximals, most of them=
 just don't got it, but a few stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola =
said to Wrath...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              =
From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


              *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...h=
mm....I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and I=
nzola*
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: =
THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Satu=
rday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


 =
               Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

                "Nic=
e to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my repair." Inzola said. De=
emos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then looked back to Wrath.

=
                "So, what are we supposed to do right now?" Deemos asked Wr=
ath...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
      Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:53 AM
                  Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


                  Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the I=
nzola that Deemos spoke about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his h=
and for a hand shake*
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                 From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
               =
     Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                    Deemos looked at the CR =
Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

               =
     "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.
=

                    "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

                  =
  Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                    Artist runs around =
in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. He runs aw=
ay from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mountain and a=
n avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass through his mi=
nd. Hours later, he awakes.

                    "Oh, that was some blow, b=
ut I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

                    "Plintissa? Wh=
ere are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remem=
bered that she was in the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, s=
o he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

                =
    "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? For me death was near." Artist =
said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew into Artist's arms. Artist laug=
hed and they kissed. After the kiss.

                    "Do me a favor, A=
rtist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

               =
     "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They=
 both laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

               =
     Dracona held up her scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

   =
                 "I can find that device I lost." Dracona said.

          =
          "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, =
it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful=
 eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

                 =
   The Radicons sat there still...

---------------------------------------=
-------------------------------------
